Released: 19 August 2025

EDB Postgres Distributed 4.4.0 is a minor release that includes several bug fixes and enhancements.

## Bug Fixes

<table class="table w-100"><thead><tr><th>Component</th><th>Version</th><th>Description</th><th width="10%">Addresses</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td>BDR</td><td>4.4.0</td><td><details><summary>Addressed CVE-2025-2506, which could enable a user with CONNECT access to obtain read access to replicated tables.</summary><hr/><p>An issue, <a href="/security/advisories/cve20252506/">CVE-2025-2506</a>, was discovered in pglogical which is present in later versions of BDR and PGD. The issue could enable a user with CONNECT access to obtain read access to replicated tables.</p>
